input.sentences: we decided to take a group tour this weekend .
we visited many areas including this ancient building .
it was extremely large and you can tell it was old .
everyone was tired and ended up relaxing at the beach .
output.sentences: This weekend, we decided to take a beach tour.
We visited a lot of places, including an ancient building.
It was extremely old but still beautiful.
After that, we went scuba diving.
We were so tired after all the activities that we spent the rest of our time relaxing on the beach.
